prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with shimmering scales and vibrant fins.
I want a Pokemon that evolves from a small fish into a powerful creature.
Generate a playful aquatic Pokemon that loves to splash around.
Make a Pokemon that is known for its weak attack but is loved by many.
Imagine a unique Pokemon that can be found in urban ponds and rivers.
Design a whimsical Pokemon that has a bright red body and golden fins.
Show me a fun Pokemon that inspires trainers despite its low battle stats.

distinctive_features: Two large fins on the sides
A distinctive fin on the back
